title: Software Engineer
description: Worked as a consultant to clients as well as worked on internal projects.
items: Conducted peer interviews for potential engineers
Presented talks and workshops on-site and conferences
Coaching and pairing with feature teams on testing practices
Coached individuals on testing practices
Founded a QA/testing community of practice

title: Test Lead
description: Oversaw quality and testing practices on a feature team. Helped deliver the feature from concept to the first beta users.
stack: AWS, Angular, Protractor, Typescript, Runscope, Azure DevOps, Python, Locust, MSSQL
items: Wrote test cases for features implemented by team
Tested features implemented by team
Worked with product owner to accept features
Implemented contract testing for a third party API required for team's primary feature
Provided cross team quality/testing coaching and support

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: A R&D feature team focused on delivering ag data applications.
stack: AWS, Java, Spring Boot, jUnit, React, Jest, Typescript, Scala, Python, Ruby, Groovy, Jenkins, Swagger, Gatling, Prometheus
items: Developed and tested applications
Deployed and maintained AWS infrastructure through CloudFormation
Helped drive team towards full cross functionality where development, testing, ops are tasks not roles
Acted as the team's test lead
Provided insight to risk mitigation, testing concerns
Provided quality and testing coaching to the team through pairing and katas
Cross team quality and testing coaching
Provided coaching around javascript, node, React and general web technologies
Developed testing tools and processes for the team
Created and maintained swagger documents for feature APIs
Participated in on-call rotation in after-hours support of all team's systems
Developed tool for testing CloudWatch alarms and their integration with xMatters
Implemented other teams features or backlog to unblock delivery

title: Software Engineer
description: Responsible for implementing system acceptance testing using Protractor across multiple applications.
items: Cleared lengthy backlog of test automation
Standardized all protractor test suites and page object implementations
Standardized how test data was defined and used
Integrated protractor tests in to continuous integration/deployment pipeline
Implemented load and stress testing of the API using JMeter
Implemented script for generating JMeter test plans from telemetry data

title: Software Engineer
description: A pilot feature team to delivery a mobile application for uploading ag data.
items: Implemented system acceptance testing for a cross platform mobile application developed with Xamarin
Created web app for visualizing spatiotemporal ag data onto a map

title: Quality Engineer
description: Built out an evergreen QA automation team/practice. Lead those efforts through a subcommittee developing our technology stack, processes, documentation & best practices. Was also the lead QA engineer for my business channel as well as rotating scrum master for channels.
items: Collaborated with product owner, test lead & developers to create test strategy for business channel and test plans for products
Delivered all test automation for business channel
Managed a small team of remote testers
Implemented library for parsing and validating DTCC data files (POV, COM, FAR)
Implemented library for validating PDF files against a template PDF file
Implemented roles based security end to end test suite
Created automation suite to input data in to Trilogy DCM using declarative data files

title: Quality Engineer
description: Responsible for designing, implementing and maintaining system acceptance testing across multiple applications/environments.
stack: AWS, Ruby, Ruby On Rails, Webdriver, RSpec, Jenkins, Postgres, Redis
items: Moved company from manual QA processes to automated giving us better test coverage, faster deploys and more time for QAs to perform exploratory testing
Implemented system acceptance testing using Selenium
Implemented continuous integration deployment pipeline in Jenkins
Implemented end to end and integration testing of internal/external APIs
Implemented stress testing of applications and APIs using JMeter
Implemented unit tests for existing untested code
Implemented cross validation of the classification engine using a k-fold cross validation
Created application for text scraping web sites using a rule system based on url pattern matching
Created application to filter a high throughput data stream using naive bayesian classification and set logic
